attributes.action: Give everyone within the Home Counties a vote for the London Mayor.
attributes.additional_details: The extension of the ULEZ to the Greater London boundaries also impacts directly and negatively on those who live outside London, but whose work, shops, hospitals, friends and caring responsibilities etc fall within the Greater London boundaries; as the detrimental effects of this decision now stretch beyond London's borders and deep into the home counties, it is only fair that those now asked to pay the Mayor's tax have a say in who that Mayor is; after all no taxation without representation.
attributes.background: We want the Government to extend the franchise for electing the London Mayor to all voters resident in the Home Counties that border Greater London.
